original_title: How to Dance Through Time Vol. 1: The Romance of mid-19th Century Couple Dances
overview: How to Dance Through Time, Volume I gives clear and repeated instructions to teach viewers the Waltz, Gallop, Polka, Schottische, and Polka Mazurka; five dances that were essential for anyone attending a mid-19th century ball. For the first time, dance partners held each other in a face-to-face embrace as they turned and swirled around the ballroom.
title: How to Dance Through Time Vol. 1: The Romance of mid-19th Century Couple Dances
